# law of large number
# 大数定理/掷骰子
dice <- function(n){
  library(ggplot2)
  m = 0
  times = c()
  p = c()
  for (i in 1:n) {
    value = sample(c(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6), 1, replace = TRUE, prob = c(1/6, 1/6, 1/6, 1/6, 1/6, 1/6))
    if(value == 1){
      m = m + 1
      times[i] = m
      p[i] = m/i
    }else{
      times[i] = m
      p[i] = m/i
    }
  }
  df <- data.frame(times, p)
  ggplot(df, aes(x = times, y = p)) + geom_line() + geom_smooth(method = lm)
}
